4 geometry_msgs::TransformStamped GoalGeneratorBaselink2D::evalGoal() {
5  auto pose = lookupTransform(map_frame_, object_frame_);
6  geometry_msgs::Vector3 &translation = pose.transform.translation;
7  geometry_msgs::Quaternion &rotation = pose.transform.rotation;
8 
9  auto rpy = Converter::getRPYfromQuaternion(rotation);
10 
11  setGoalTranslation(translation, rpy);
12  setGoalRotation(rotation, rpy);
13 
14  return pose;
15 }
16 
17 void GoalGeneratorBaselink2D::setGoalRotation(geometry_msgs::Quaternion &rotation, RPY rpy) const {
18  tf2::Quaternion q;
19  q.setRPY(0, 0, M_PI + rpy.yaw);
20  rotation.w = q.w();
21  rotation.x = q.x();
22  rotation.y = q.y();
23  rotation.z = q.z();
24 }
25 
26 void GoalGeneratorBaselink2D::setGoalTranslation(geometry_msgs::Vector3 &pt, RPY rpy) const {
27  const double &r = goal_dist_from_obj_;
28 
29  pt.x = pt.x + r * cos(rpy.yaw);
30  pt.y = pt.y + r * sin(rpy.yaw);
31  pt.z = 0;
32 }
